marklogic.body: I went to the game last night. Turco was not very good. He wasn't tested very often - most of the shots were from outside - but he did glove a lot of shots from the point, which prevented rebounds. When Ducks had real scoring chances they seemed to have Turco beat. They hit 3 posts on scoring chances - and actually beat him on 3 straight shots before the goal that was disallowed went past him - a sequence - Off the post - but past him, the rebound beat him, but was blocked by his d - behind him, and then the third shot beat him Cold (but was disallowed). Based on LUCK - it was a good outcome - but with his play he was beaten enough times to give up about 5 goals - on just 25 shots.....
